frameDefinitions: Two or more distinct entities, which may be concrete or abstract objects or types, are characterized as being similar to each other.
The Agent is assigned to a Post where he or she performs a task associated with that Post.
This frame is concerned with words that describe a person based on a salient part of their body.
An Agent prepares for an Activity. '' 'The troops were preparing themselves for the mission.'
An individual or organization, the Front, serves as a cover for an Illicit_activity or an Illicit_organization.
An Agent behaves as if they were a particular individual or type of Simulated_entity with the intent of misleading observers of their behavior.
frameExamples:
A mulberry is very <t>similar</t> in shape
to a loganberry
The troops were <t>preparing</t> themselves for the mission.
The laundromat is a <t>front</t> for the Yakuza.
The belfast bank robbers <t>posed</t> as police.
listRoleDefinitions: This role marks constituents that express the set of objects or types whose similarity is at issue.

When there is an asymmetry, <fen>Entity_1</fen> is the entity characterized by its similarity to <fen>Entity_2</fen>, whose characteristics are assumed to be known.  <fen>Entity_1</fen> is often an external argument.

When the <fen>Entities</fen> are expressed separately, <fen>Entity_2</fen> is the one whose characteristics are assumed to be known; it serves as a basis for establishing characteristics of <fen>Entity_1</fen>.
This role marks constituents which express a property in respect to which the similarity of the entities is assessed.
A fact about <fen>Entity_1</fen> or the <fen>Entities</fen> that reveals how <fen>Entity_1</fen> is the same or different from other entities.  (Note the contrast with 'as to'.)
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the similarity occurs or exists.
The Place is the general area in which similarity occurs or exists
The <fen>Agent</fen> is assigned to a <fen>Post</fen> to perform a task involving a <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The <fen>Post</fen> is a location or station assigned to the <fen>Agent</fen> where a task or tasks are to be performed.
The <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is centrally involved in the task the <fen>Agent</fen> is assigned to perform. It is normally located at the <fen>Post</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> works at the <fen>Post</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> staffs the <fen>Post</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Individual</fen> (or individuals) being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
An <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is preparing.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Front</fen> acts as a legitimate individual, organization, or enterprise, but is truly a cover for an illicit organization or activity.
The existence and activities of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> are concealed by the <fen>Front</fen>.
The <fen>Illicit_activity</fen> of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> is concealed by (the activities of) the <fen>Front</fen> .
The time at which the deceptive activity occurs
The place where the fronting occurs.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who acts in a misleading way to create the impression that they are a particular individual or type of <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
The type or individual that the <fen>Agent</fen> gives the impression of being.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> impersonates the <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> gives the impression that they are the <fen>Simulated_entity</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The two painters</fex> were alike in being unable to draw acceptably .
In the first phase <fex>Barthes's approach</fex> has similarities to that of Levi-Strauss.
The results of Method 2 show remarkable similarity <fex>to those obtained by Method 1</fex>
The disc announced Friday is <fex>physically</fex> similar to current music CDs
His presidency was different <fex>in that it offered a way forward for the common man</fex> .
Sue was staffing <fex>the entrance</fex> when everything started to go wrong.
Working the front desk <fex>at a real estate office</fex> is not as fulfilling as it might seem.
The red-haired <fex>figure</fex> stood in the doorway.
